newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle Friday roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle Friday roundup - USDA.

text.p: Trade was inactive in the panhandle area on Friday, USDA said.

Slaughter steers and heifers were not tested. Feedlots reported light inquiry from buyers following weekly movement of 112,000 head. The last established price was $66.00 per cwt on Tuesday. Friday's packer bids were 65.00-65.50, with asking prices 66.00-67.00.
Note all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Confirmed: None Last Week: None Year Ago: None
